_trigger_source_type.description: The type of system that triggered the event. Examples: api, automation, operation, portal_user

_trigger_source.description: Identifier of the specific trigger source. Examples: user ID, automation execution ID, activity ID, portal user email

operation.description: The entity operation type that triggered this event

activity_id.description: Activity ID associated with this operation (ULID)

trigger_entity.description: Entity ID of the entity that triggered this event

_schema.description: URL-friendly identifier for the entity schema

_org.description: Organization Id the entity belongs to

_title.description: Generated title for the entity based on schema title_template

balance_currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

balance_decimal.description: The currency value as a decimal string

contracts.description: Array of contract entities (hydrated from entity graph)

_schema.description: URL-friendly identifier for the entity schema

_org.description: Organization Id the entity belongs to

_title.description: Generated title for the entity based on schema title_template

street.description: The first line of the address. Typically the street address or PO Box number.

street_number.description: The second line of the address. Typically the number of the apartment, suite, or unit.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the address.

city.description: The name of the city, district, village, or town.

country.description: The two-letter code for the country of the address.

additional_info.description: An additional description for the address

company_name.description: the company name, usually used as extra delivery instructions

first_name.description: the first name of the recipient, usually used as extra delivery instructions

last_name.description: the last name of the recipient, usually used as extra delivery instructions

salutation.description: the salutation of the recipient, usually used as extra delivery instructions

title.description: the title of the recipient, usually used as extra delivery instructions

installment_amount_currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

installment_amount_decimal.description: The currency value as a decimal string

balance_currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

balance_decimal.description: The currency value as a decimal string

BaseRelationRef.description: Reference to a specific property of another entity

path.description: The property of the entity (pointed by entity_id) to be used as the reference

roles.description: Deprecated! Please use Permissions API instead

TaxAmountBreakdown.description: A tax amount associated with a specific tax rate.

rate.description: The tax rate applied. With the release of the tax manager feature this field is being deprecated in favor of the tax field.

rateValue.description: The tax rate value applied. With the release of the tax manager feature this field is being deprecated in favor of the tax field.

Currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.

RecurrenceAmount.description: An amount associated with a specific recurrence.

RecurrenceAmountWithTax.description: An amount associated with a specific recurrence.

TotalDetails.description: The total details with tax (and discount) aggregated totals.

amount_shipping.description: This is the sum of all the price item shipping amounts.

amount_tax.description: This is the sum of all the price item tax amounts.

breakdown.description: Breakdown of individual tax (and discount) amounts that add up to the totals.

taxes.description: The aggregated price items tax amount per rate.

recurrences.description: The aggregated price items tax amount per rate.

recurrencesByTax.description: The aggregated price items recurrences by tax rate
